text:
Dear Veselin,

 

Here are the answers for your questions:

 

1.	Unfortunately you cannot enter through active directory, it is only for internal users. As an external user you can only enter using certificate authentication.
2.	Once your NUMA is arrived and signed by FGSZ, your account will be activated on the productive platform, but please note that you have to make sure that you are added to Bulgartransgaz’s user list, and you have the necessary financial limit at Bulgartransgaz.

 

If you have any further questions please do not hesitate to ask.

 

 

Best regards,

 



From: tbl_ood@mail.bg <tbl_ood@mail.bg> 
Sent: Tuesday, September 24, 2019 8:35 AM
To: RBP <rbp@fgsz.hu>
Subject: RE: RBP Registration - TIBIEL EOOD

 

Dear all,

thank you for your fast response.

Today, we will send the signed Network User Membership Agreement.

I have two questions:

1. About the test system: can I enter through active directory and which mail and pass I need to use?

2. After you receive signed document, how long will take to activate our account (not in test mode) and could I use active directory or I need to use only certificate authentication?

Best regards,

Veselin Todorov


--

----- Цитат от RBP (rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> ), на 23.09.2019 в 08:24 -----

	Dear Veselin,

	 

	Your registration on the RBP portal was successful. I am sending you the Network User Membership Agreement attached. As a next step of the registration process, please send us two physical copies duly signed.

	You can also access our test system through the following link: https://ipnew.test.fgsz.hu/Fgsz.Klp.Web.UAT/#main

	 

	 

	Best regards,

	 

	

	 

	 

________________________________

	 

	From: tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg>  <tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg> > 
	Sent: Friday, September 20, 2019 1:48 PM
	To: RBP <rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> >
	Subject: RBP Registration - TIBIEL EOOD

	 

	Dear colleagues,

	My name is Veselin Todorov, and I'm making a registration of NU to RBP. The name of NU is TIBIEL EOOD.

	So, I submit the form, but nothing happened after that. Do I need to do something more or?

	Please, becouse we have a contract for NG deliveries from 1.10.2019, could you register us as soon as possible?

	Thanks in advance!!!

	You can call me at any time on +359885851514

	Best regards,

	Veselin Todorov

	
	--
	
	
	-------------------------------------
	П.П. Знаеш ли, че можеш да си направиш сайт бързо и лесно? Нужно ти е по-малко от час и е готов. Научи как на www.superhosting.bg
	<http://ads.mail.bg/delivery/ck.php?oaparams=2__bannerid=4242__zoneid=35__OXLCA=1__cb=423bee9591__oadest=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.superhosting.bg%2Fsite-builder.php%3Futm_source%3Dmbg%26utm_medium%3Dcpm%26utm_content%3Dmail_footer%26utm_campaign%3Dnewuser_campaign2019>

Az uzenetet kizarolag a cimzett, illetve az altala meghatalmazottak hasznalhatjak fel. Ha On nem az uzenet cimzettje, ugy kerjuk, hogy telefonon, vagy e-mail-ben ertesitse errol az uzenet kuldojet es torolje az uzenetet, valamint annak osszes csatolt mellekletet a rendszerebol. Ha On nem az uzenet cimzettje, abban az esetben tilos az uzenetet vagy annak barmely csatolt mellekletet lemasolnia, elmentenie, az uzenet tartalmat barkivel kozolnie vagy azzal visszaelnie. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This message and any attachment are confidential and are legally privileged.
